info.title: OPERA Cloud Room Rotation Service API
info.description:
APIs to facilitate Room Rotation functionality in OPERA Cloud. Api provides capability to handle Room Rotation in OPERA Cloud. Room Rotation provides room ownership options for automatic inventory rotation and prioritization for owner rooms assignment and occupancy.

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 25.4.0.0.

get.summary: Get list of reservations and the associated rotations points
get.description:
This API will allow a user to retrieve list of reservations and the number of rotation points associated with a given reservation for requested hotel, departure start date, departure end date, and room numbers.

OperationId:getReservationRotationPoints

This API allows a time span of 30 days.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique Id for the Hotel

parameters.name: departureStartDate
parameters.description: Departure Start Date of the reservation to be searched.

parameters.name: departureEndDate
parameters.description: Departure End Date of the reservation to be searched.

parameters.name: roomIds
parameters.description: List of Room Ids for which to return Reservation Rotation Points.

parameters.name: confirmationNumber
parameters.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

parameters.name: surname
parameters.description: Family name, last name.

parameters.name: givenName
parameters.description: Given name, first name or names

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

200.description: Response object for fetching Reservation Rotation Points. Based on the criteria, reservations and associated rotation points are returned.

get.summary: Get list of rotation points details associated with a reservation with adjustment log.
get.description:
This API will allow a user to retrieve list of rotation points details along with adjustment log for requested hotel, reservation Id and room number.

OperationId:getReservationRotationPointsDetails

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique Id of the Hotel for the reservation.

parameters.name: reservationId
parameters.description: Unique OPERA reservation ID which is used to find reservation from OPERA. This ID is a primary identification of a reservation in OPERA.

parameters.name: roomId
parameters.description: Room number of the reservation.

parameters.name: includeAdjustmentLog
parameters.description: Include adjustment log details in the response.

200.description: Response object for fetching Reservation Rotation Points Details. Rotation points details with adjustment log are returned for the requested hotel, reservation Id and room number.

204.description: Reservation Rotation Points Details not found.

put.summary: Update Rotation Points Details associated with a reservation.
put.description:
This API will allow a user to modify rotation points for the requested hotel, reservation Id and room number.

OperationId:putReservationRotationPointsDetails

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique Id of the Hotel for the reservation.

parameters.name: reservationId
parameters.description: Unique OPERA reservation ID which is used to find reservation from OPERA. This ID is a primary identification of a reservation in OPERA.

parameters.name: roomId
parameters.description: Room number of the reservation.

parameters.name: reservationRotationPoints
parameters.description: Collection of Reservation Rotation Points Details

get.description:
Use this API to fetch the individual units' rotation points.

OperationId:getRoomRotationPoints

The maximum allowable limit for this API is 100.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique Id for the Hotel

parameters.name: roomRotationPointsDate
parameters.description: The date for which the Room Rotation Points are being requested

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records the API should return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

parameters.name: roomClasses
parameters.description: List of Room Classes for which to return Room Rotation Points. Multiple values can be entered by adding multiple query parameters.

parameters.name: roomTypes
parameters.description: List of Room Types for which to return Room Rotation Points. Multiple values can be entered by adding multiple query parameters.

parameters.name: roomIds
parameters.description: List of Room Ids for which to return Room Rotation Points. Multiple values can be entered by adding multiple query parameters.

200.description: Response object for fetching Room Rotation Points. Based on the criteria, Room Rotation Points information is returned

put.summary: Update Rotation Points by Room Numbers
put.description:
Use this operation to update balance forward and adjusted points of individual rooms.

OperationId:putRoomRotationPoints

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique Id for the Hotel

parameters.name: roomRotationPointsAdjustment
parameters.description: Request details containing room, balance forward and adjusted points to update.

get.description:
Use this API to fetch profile Rooms with Room Ownership or Owner Referral records associated.

OperationId:getRoomOwnerships

parameters.name: profileId
parameters.description: Unique ID of profile.

parameters.name: hotelIds
parameters.description: Unique Id(s) for the Hotel(s). Multiple Hotels can be entered by adding multiple query parameters.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The starting value of the date range.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The ending value of the date range.

parameters.name: includeReferral
parameters.description: Include Owner Referral in response flag.

parameters.name: includeAvailableRoomsOnly
parameters.description: Flag indicating if only rooms available for booking during the date range specified should be included in response.

200.description: Response object for Rooms with Room Ownership or Owner Referral records. Based on the criteria, associated Owner Rooms are returned.

get.description:
Get Room Ownership details for specific room(s) or owners. Hotel Id(s) and at least one other search criteria is required.

OperationId:getRoomOwners

parameters.name: hotelIds
parameters.description: Unique Id(s) for the Hotel(s) queried.

parameters.name: surname
parameters.description: Family name, last name.

parameters.name: givenName
parameters.description: Given name, first name or names

parameters.name: startDateFrom
parameters.description: The starting value of the start date range.

parameters.name: startDateTo
parameters.description: The ending value of the start date range.

parameters.name: endDateFrom
parameters.description: The starting value of the end date range.

parameters.name: endDateTo
parameters.description: The ending value of the end date range.

parameters.name: roomClasses
parameters.description: List of Room Classes for which to return Room Owners. Multiple values can be entered by adding multiple query parameters.

parameters.name: roomTypes
parameters.description: List of Room Types for which to return Room Owners. Multiple values can be entered by adding multiple query parameters.

parameters.name: roomIds
parameters.description: List of Room Ids for which to return Room Owners. Multiple values can be entered by adding multiple query parameters.

parameters.name: contractNumber
parameters.description: Contract Number of the Ownership Record.

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Indicates whether to return inactive records. Records are considered inactive when the end date of the ownership record is prior to the current property business date.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records the API should return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

200.description: Response object for List of Room Owners. Based on the criteria, associated List of Room Owners are returned.
